Question: After her sister, Mimi Smith, twice complained to Liverpool's Social Services, Julia handed the care of this person over to her.
Hints: This person was raised as an Anglican and attended Dovedale Primary School.
After his marriage to Yoko Ono in 1969, he changed his name to John Ono ****.
In May 1968, while his wife was on holiday in Greece, this person invited Ono to visit.
